name: Wood Halfpieces
description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood roofs or walls require a floor or wall structure such asWood Wallfor snapping. Hold 'R' while placing the Wood Halfpieces itself to determine shape as well as placement as roof, or wall.
